attributes.action: stop immigration, and the admission of asylum seekers to this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Uncontrolled immigration and the wholesale abuse of asylum laws is starting to fundamentally destroy this country. The impact of this on crime, public health, safety, employment and the economy is likely, in the future, to lead to civil unrest, exposure to terrorism, and a diminishing of accepted standards of decency, and standard of living, for the indiginous population

rejection.details: there are lots of anti-immigration petitions already on the site
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
